body:
So it works fine only if I include both import torch and your line like so
```python
if __name__ == '__main__':
    torch.multiprocessing.set_start_method('spawn')
    import torchvision
    #... rest of the code
```
But it's hard to stick to this method in a large project, where I have many .py files.
